analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naupekkhāsahagato
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham upekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na upekkhā sahagataḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham upekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭighaḥ na upekkhā sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe a nidassana appaṭigha

original: upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupekkhāsahagato ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na upekkhā sahagataḥ ca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe
analyzed: na aupekkhā sahagataḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha ārammaṇe

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanaupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham na upekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na na upekkhā sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
